name: Customer Services
description: Template for customer service representatives focusing on tickets, resolutions, customer feedback, and escalations.

capturePrompts.label: Customer Issue
capturePrompts.prompt: What is the customer's problem or request?
capturePrompts.placeholder: e.g., Can't login, Billing dispute, Feature request

capturePrompts.label: Resolution Status
capturePrompts.placeholder: e.g., Resolved, Pending, Escalated to engineering

capturePrompts.label: Follow-up Needed
capturePrompts.placeholder: e.g., Check back in 24h, Send confirmation, Escalate to manager

capturePrompts.label: Ticket Reference
capturePrompts.prompt: What is the ticket or case number?

llmSystemPrompt: You are assisting a Customer Service professional. Focus on issue resolution, customer satisfaction, and timely follow-ups. Identify escalation needs, track resolution status, and suggest proactive outreach. Prioritize empathy and clear communication.
